Name: Sibilant Production in Cochlear Implant Patients
Description: This corpous contains German speech recordings of 48 cochlear implant users (CI) and 48 speakers without hearing impairment (control group, KG). CI_2_Sibilants contains recordings used for the analysis of /s/ and /Êƒ/ in the following words: 'Tasse', 'Tasche'.
Group: Corpora with transcriptions and audio recordings
